MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD5 postcode area of Kelso. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:30pm to repair broken equipment on our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:43pm on the 27th of March 2021.
